title: BIP 32: Improve how Sett APY’s are represented on Badger App
body:
TLDR; Increase accuracy of APY’s displayed about Badger Setts on the app by showing a range of returns depending on boost, and adding text that explains how the boost is determined, so that end-users can accurately gauge what APY they will receive.

Results: Replace current APYs with an "APY Range" and explain how boost impacts the range directly on app page and in mouse-over box.

See discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-32-improve-how-sett-apys-are-represented-on-badger-app/2603
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
